statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_eta WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, estimated_time_of_arrival FROM vehicle_eta WHERE destination_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_eta ORDER BY estimated_time_of_arrival DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, estimated_time_of_arrival FROM vehicle_eta WHERE current_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT vehicle_id, destination_location FROM vehicle_eta WHERE route_data->>'distance' > '100';
SELECT current_location, destination_location, estimated_time_of_arrival FROM vehicle_eta WHERE vehicle_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_eta WHERE estimated_time_of_arrival < '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT vehicle_id, destination_location, route_data FROM vehicle_eta WHERE current_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_eta WHERE current_location <> destination_location AND vehicle_id IN (102, 103);
SELECT vehicle_id, estimated_time_of_arrival FROM vehicle_eta WHERE route_data -> 'distance' > 100;
SELECT * FROM vehicles
SELECT current_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT vehicle_id FROM vehicles WHERE current_location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM estimated_arrival_times WHERE estimated_arrival_time > '2022-05-10'
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicles ORDER BY current_location ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, JSON_EXTRACT(route_data, '$.destination') AS destination FROM vehicles WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(route_data, JSON_OBJECT('status', 'enroute'));
SELECT vehicle_id, estimated_arrival_time FROM estimated_arrival_times WHERE estimated_arrival_time > NOW() ORDER BY estimated_arrival_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(estimated_arrival_time) AS arrival_count FROM estimated_arrival_times GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING arrival_count > 3 ORDER BY arrival_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, estimated_time FROM estimated_arrival_time WHERE vehicle_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, timestamp FROM vehicle_locations WHERE current_location LIKE '%city%';
SELECT * FROM estimated_arrival_time WHERE estimated_time > '2022-09-01 12:00:00';
SELECT route_name, count(vehicle_id) as total_vehicles FROM routes GROUP BY route_name ORDER BY total_vehicles DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicle_locations ORDER BY current_location ASC;
SELECT route_name, estimated_time FROM route_data WHERE estimated_time > 30;

SELECT v.vehicle_id, r.route_name, ae.estimated_arrival_time FROM vehicle_routes vr JOIN vehicle_locations v ON vr.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN arrival_estimations ae ON vr.route_id = ae.route_id JOIN route_data r ON ae.route_id = r.route_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, COUNT(route_id) AS route_count FROM vehicle_routes GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING route_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_locations WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, estimated_time FROM route_data ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, estimated_arrival_time FROM arrival_estimations WHERE vehicle_id = 2 ORDER BY estimated_arrival_time ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, route_data.route_name, estimated_arrival_time FROM arrival_estimations JOIN route_data ON arrival_estimations.route_id = route_data.route_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, arrival_estimations.route_id FROM vehicle_locations LEFT JOIN arrival_estimations ON vehicle_locations.vehicle_id = arrival_estimations.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM routes ORDER BY route_name DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location, route_id FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 3;
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT e.route_id, r.route_name, e.estimated_time FROM estimated_arrival_times e JOIN routes r ON e.route_id = r.route_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE route_id = 2;
SELECT vehicle_id, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE current_location = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, route_id, estimated_time FROM estimated_arrival_times;
